member.name: T:ZenohDotNet.Native.BufferPool
member.summary: Provides buffer pooling utilities for reducing allocations in hot paths.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.BufferPool.Rent(System.Int32)
member.summary: Rents a buffer from the pool.
member.returns: A rented buffer (may be larger than requested).

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.BufferPool.Return(System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a buffer to the pool.
member.param: Whether to clear the buffer before returning.

member.name: T:ZenohDotNet.Native.Utf8Helper
member.summary: Provides optimized UTF-8 encoding utilities.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.Utf8Helper.GetNullTerminatedByteCount(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the byte count for a string when encoded as null-terminated UTF-8.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.Utf8Helper.EncodeToPooledBuffer(System.String)
member.summary: Encodes a string to a pooled buffer as null-terminated UTF-8. Returns the actual bytes written (including null terminator). Caller must return the buffer to the pool.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.Utf8Helper.EncodeToSpan(System.String,System.Span{System.Byte},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Encodes a string directly into a provided span. Returns the number of bytes written (excluding null terminator if not requested).

member.name: T:ZenohDotNet.Native.RentedBuffer
member.summary: A disposable wrapper for a rented buffer that returns it to the pool on dispose.

member.name: T:ZenohDotNet.Native.LivelinessSubscriber
member.summary: Represents a Zenoh liveliness subscriber. Receives notifications when liveliness tokens are created or dropped.

member.name: P:ZenohDotNet.Native.LivelinessSubscriber.KeyExpression
member.summary: Gets the key expression this subscriber is bound to.

member.name: T:ZenohDotNet.Native.LivelinessToken
member.summary: Represents a Zenoh liveliness token. A liveliness token signals that a resource is alive.

member.name: P:ZenohDotNet.Native.LivelinessToken.KeyExpression
member.summary: Gets the key expression this token is bound to.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_last_error
member.summary: Gets the last error message. Returns NULL if no error occurred. The returned string is valid until the next FFI call on the same thread.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_open(System.Byte*)
member.summary: Opens a Zenoh session with the given configuration (JSON5 string). Pass NULL or empty string for default configuration. Returns a pointer on success, NULL on failure. Call zenoh_last_error() for error details.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_close(System.Void*)
member.summary: Closes a Zenoh session and frees all associated resources.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_declare_publisher(System.Void*,System.Byte*)
member.summary: Declares a publisher on the given key expression. Returns a pointer on success, NULL on failure. Call zenoh_last_error() for error details.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_publisher_put(System.Void*,System.Byte*,System.UIntPtr)
member.summary: Publishes data on the given publisher. Returns ZenohError code. Call zenoh_last_error() for error details.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_undeclare_publisher(System.Void*)
member.summary: Undeclares and frees a publisher.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_declare_subscriber(System.Void*,System.Byte*,ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_declare_subscriber_callback_delegate,System.Void*)
member.summary: Declares a subscriber on the given key expression with a callback. Returns a pointer on success, NULL on failure. Call zenoh_last_error() for error details.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_undeclare_subscriber(System.Void*)
member.summary: Undeclares and frees a subscriber.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_free_string(System.Byte*)
member.summary: Frees a string allocated by the Zenoh FFI.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_get(System.Void*,System.Byte*,ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_get_callback_delegate,System.Void*)
member.summary: Performs a get query (request-response pattern). Returns 0 on success, error code on failure. Call zenoh_last_error() for error details.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_declare_queryable(System.Void*,System.Byte*,ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_declare_queryable_callback_delegate,System.Void*)
member.summary: Declares a queryable that responds to get queries. Returns a pointer on success, NULL on failure. Call zenoh_last_error() for error details.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_query_reply(System.Void*,System.Byte*,System.Byte*,System.UIntPtr)
member.summary: Replies to a query with data. The query handle is consumed by this operation. Call zenoh_last_error() for error details.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_query_selector(System.Void*)
member.summary: Gets the selector (key expression) of a query. Returns a C string that must be freed with zenoh_free_string.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_undeclare_queryable(System.Void*)
member.summary: Undeclares and frees a queryable.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_publisher_options_default
member.summary: Creates default publisher options

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_declare_publisher_with_options(System.Void*,System.Byte*,ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.PublisherOptions*)
member.summary: Declares a publisher with options. Returns a pointer on success, NULL on failure.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_delete(System.Void*,System.Byte*)
member.summary: Deletes data for a key expression. Returns ZenohError code.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_publisher_delete(System.Void*)
member.summary: Deletes data using a publisher. Returns ZenohError code.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_put(System.Void*,System.Byte*,System.Byte*,System.UIntPtr)
member.summary: Put data directly on a session (without declaring a publisher). Returns ZenohError code.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_liveliness_declare_token(System.Void*,System.Byte*)
member.summary: Declares a liveliness token for the given key expression. Returns a pointer on success, NULL on failure.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_liveliness_undeclare_token(System.Void*)
member.summary: Undeclares and frees a liveliness token.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_liveliness_declare_subscriber(System.Void*,System.Byte*,ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_liveliness_declare_subscriber_callback_delegate,System.Void*)
member.summary: Declares a liveliness subscriber. The callback receives (key_expr, is_alive, context). Returns a pointer on success, NULL on failure.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_session_zid(System.Void*)
member.summary: Gets the Zenoh ID of the session as a hex string. Returns a C string that must be freed with zenoh_free_string.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_publisher_put_with_encoding(System.Void*,System.Byte*,System.UIntPtr,ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.ZenohEncodingId)
member.summary: Publishes data with encoding on the given publisher.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_put_with_encoding(System.Void*,System.Byte*,System.Byte*,System.UIntPtr,ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.ZenohEncodingId)
member.summary: Puts data directly on a key expression with encoding.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_put_with_attachment(System.Void*,System.Byte*,System.Byte*,System.UIntPtr,ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.ZenohAttachmentItem*,System.UIntPtr)
member.summary: Puts data with attachment on a key expression.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_declare_querier(System.Void*,System.Byte*)
member.summary: Declares a querier for repeated queries on the same key expression.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_querier_get(System.Void*,ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_querier_get_callback_delegate,System.Void*)
member.summary: Performs a get query using the querier.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.FFI.NativeMethods.zenoh_undeclare_querier(System.Void*)
member.summary: Undeclares and frees a querier.

member.name: T:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionMode
member.summary: Zenoh session mode.

member.name: F:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionMode.Peer
member.summary: Peer mode - connects to other peers and routers.

member.name: F:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionMode.Client
member.summary: Client mode - connects only to routers.

member.name: F:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionMode.Router
member.summary: Router mode - acts as a router for other peers and clients.

member.summary: Type-safe configuration builder for Zenoh sessions.

member.summary: Creates a new default configuration.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionConfig.WithMode(ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionMode)
member.summary: Sets the session mode.

member.summary: Adds an endpoint to connect to.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionConfig.WithConnect(System.String[])
member.summary: Adds multiple endpoints to connect to.

member.summary: Adds an endpoint to listen on.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionConfig.WithListen(System.String[])
member.summary: Adds multiple endpoints to listen on.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionConfig.WithMulticastScouting(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables multicast scouting for peer discovery.
member.param: True to enable multicast scouting, false to disable.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionConfig.WithMulticastInterface(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the network interface for multicast scouting.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionConfig.WithMulticastAddress(System.String)

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionConfig.WithScoutingTimeout(System.Int32)

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionConfig.WithTimestamping(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables automatic timestamping of publications.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionConfig.WithAuth(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the authentication credentials.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionConfig.WithSharedMemory(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables shared memory transport.
member.param: True to enable shared memory, false to disable.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionConfig.ToJson
member.summary: Converts this configuration to a JSON string for the native layer. Uses StringBuilder to minimize allocations.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionConfig.Peer
member.summary: Creates a default peer mode configuration.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionConfig.Client(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a client mode configuration that connects to the specified router.
member.param: The router endpoint to connect to.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.SessionConfig.Router(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a router mode configuration that listens on the specified endpoint.

member.summary: Represents a Zenoh subscriber that receives data on a key expression.

member.name: P:ZenohDotNet.Native.Subscriber.KeyExpression
member.summary: Gets the key expression this subscriber is listening on.

member.name: T:ZenohDotNet.Native.ZenohException
member.summary: Exception thrown when a Zenoh operation fails.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.ZenohException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ZenohException class.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.ZenohException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ZenohException class with a specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.ZenohException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ZenohException class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.ZenohException.GetLastNativeError
member.summary: Gets the last error message from the native Zenoh library.
member.returns: The error message, or null if no error occurred.

member.name: M:ZenohDotNet.Native.ZenohException.FromLastError(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a ZenohException with the last native error message appended.
member.returns: A new ZenohException with detailed error information.
